name: noisetanknick
text:
If it were socially acceptable and I knew other people would get the joke, I'd buy this license plate frame in a heartbeat and proudly display it on the rear of my car.

But neither of those stipulations are true.

name: afastidioushat
text: It's even better the second time around.

name: doctorother
text: I agree on both previous statements.  I think my favorite thing about the plate itself is the rather flashy font.

name: wolfsleepy
text: Looks like the same font he used for the " Fuckin' " poster in Pat's rocket ship (which I would also throw on my wall).

name: catachresis
text: A comment left by catachresis was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by equinn2006, DougTheHead, nutmeg, Darthemed)

text:

name: pascal
text: This is the strip that made me an Achewood addict. An Achict. An Achect. Fuck it.

text: A comment left by saint was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by bug, Zem, perhapsmaybe)

text: Achaholic

name: thatcrazycommie
text: Achehead?

name: rowboat
text: Oops. Sorry. Couldn't muster the strength to scroll down for the inch that it would've taken for me to see that you'd already said this. Well, Achehead it is!

name: rowboat
text: AcheHead?

name: jlynes
text: Achophile.

name: fineoakstructure
text: Woody.

name: scorpio_nadir
text: No longer an Acheist, you. I see your avatar taking communion, even.

name: stevegt500
text: you've got ache-Wood

name: stevegt500
text: (boner)

name: slab64
text: If I still worked at the DMV, I'd look up that license number and contact the owner to inform them that they're AWESOME.

name: chaesar
text: Like I said the first time, Todd loves drugs and doesn't really have a job, I don't think it's an illiteracy thing.

name: achewoodno1fan
text: i mean that is the thing todd does NOT want his plate to say. isnt that funny?

name: tetrisattack
text:
Just because Todd can't read doesn't mean sucking dick didn't buy the van.

(originally posted on the first run of this strip)

name: laserblade
text: In fact, it pretty much guarantees that it did.  Stay in school, kids!

name: peterjoel
text:
I'm just surprised Todd did something as law-abiding as getting licence plates...

Also, I thought Todd's van was metamorphosed from a stork who dropped his burrito...

name: semiquaver
text: This is the stork's last revenge.

name: rowboat
text: Don't know how I feel about a rerun, but I guess it's better than more guest strips. In fact, yes - yes it is better.

name: mattylite
text: Is a strip really the same strip just because it has the exact same pictures and the same dialogue, and is completely visually indistinguishable in its two appearances?

name: dasuta
text: The liscense plate should SO read C4FL8IO

name: atmus
text: I wish these frames were for sale somewhere, so I could put them on cars of people I hate.  Also the cars of people I like.

name: nyu
text: <--- Suckin and fuckin some dick made this guy

name: quantumcasaba
text: "I Sure Xylophone, Do I Xylophone."

name: tekende
text: I Sell Xerox, Digital Interstate Xerox.

name: 21echoes
text: what are the points of the re-runs, again?

name: mikeronomicon
text: I'm pretty sure Todd did suck a whole brick o' dick to get that van. It just seems his style.

name: theyang
text: We got the toyota new at this dealership and the man pulls out his sticker after we pay but I stop him and say hey man I don't need your advertising shit this is MY ride now. I tore off the frame the same day but left the plastic around screws so they will stay.

name: tasteful
text: i saw this a looong time ago and i just realized that it meant "i sucked dick to pay for this van", and that it wasn't just the juxtaposition of the two statements "suckin' dick" and "bought this van". i rather like my original interpretation
